attributes.action: Unfair and unjust new nationality policy!
attributes.additional_details: We believe that the new laws for citizenship from 10 February 2025 will forever lock out people from gaining citizenship rights! This is unfair, unjust and disproportionate and in direct contravention of the Geneva convention when it comes to the rights of the refugees. This policy is further in contravention of the principles of natural justice.
attributes.background: We request the government to reconsider the policy. The nationality should be based on the positive contribution to the society rather than a singular act of illegally entering the UK.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Reverse guidance stopping refugees gaining citizenship
